Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw a string telephone connecting two students, showing the cups and string clearly.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound by showing one student speaking into a cup and the other listening from the opposite cup.
The student can correctly label all parts of the string telephone, including the cups and string.
The student can include a detailed explanation, possibly in written form, of how sound travels through the string to carry messages.
CANNOT: The student might occasionally leave out minor details such as the exact positioning of a student relative to the cups, although this is unlikely at Level 4.
The student might not consistently use the most technical language possible, but still captures all necessary concepts (e.g., uses 'talks' instead of 'vibrates' when describing how sound travels).
